Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Oftentimes, after AI gives me feedback and I have implemented it to my work, when I run it through the AI again, it would tell me to do something else instead. For example:
AI: "You should change the title to ABCD"
I change it to ABCD.
AI: "You should change the title to ABCE"
It's just not consistent and isn't completely correct most of the time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI probably makes me a bit more confused and frustrated.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: My teachers are a lot more reliable and can pinpoint my weaknesses more correctly. AI can't quite remember what kind of help I need most over a period of time
